feed.title: Category: Render | Julian Code ONLY Blog

entry.title: Render more than partials
entry.content:
``` ruby

there is more to render in Ruby on Rails than :edit or <%= render ‘shared/footer’ %>

You can render …..

nothing

render nothing: true

a file

render “/current/app/views/cats/black”

inline

render inline: “<% cats.each do |p| %>

<%= p.name %>

<% end %>”

text

render text: “More cats please.”

JSON

render json: @cats

XML

render xml: @cats

JavaScript

render js: “alert(‘Hello Kitty’);”

```
